snippet.title: Crisis On Nova-2 | Teaser Trailer | Sci-Fi Point and Click Visual Novel
snippet.description:
Check out Crisis on Nova-2 on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1387230/Crisis_on_Nova2/

Crisis on Nova-2 is an 18+  visual novel with clever puzzles, intriguing dialogue, and lots of steamy scenes. It is a character driven story that takes place on the Nova-2, a colony ship headed for the distant reaches of space on a mission to find a habitable planet.
